hud.holdDrag: Hold the left click to drag and change the priority
hud.priority: The order of each population determines their priority

blockDescription.block0: Center of the city, all block must be connected to it
blockDescription.block4: Harness the green energy of the wind during the night
blockDescription.block5: Harness the green energy of the sun during the day
blockDescription.block6: Generates massive amounts of power. It requires some Covridians to work
blockDescription.block7: The fire station sends out fire robots to the location of fire
blockDescription.block8: Police station responds to riot in progress, if they can stop them!
blockDescription.block10: Sick people needs a good place
blockDescription.block12: Plants from a galaxy far far away...
blockDescription.block14: We cook up new schemes in this laboratory. Like a new'n'tasty food...
blockDescription.block15: If you survive recruit training, you will be a weapon. You will be a minister of death praying for war
blockDescription.block17: Where does this giant come from? Surely a guinea pig
blockDescription.block20: I hold the world but as the world, Gratiano, a stage, where every man must play a part
blockDescription.block24: The secret of the S.U Industry
blockDescription.block26: The S.U Army weapon testing bench

bulletinTitle.bulletin3: Colony 43 just elected a new president
bulletinTitle.bulletin4: The comet Teklo3 crosses the Union Stellar area
bulletinTitle.bulletin20: News about the investigation on the original system
bulletinTitle.bulletin21: Escape of the public enemy NÂ°2
bulletinTitle.bulletin23: A cheese that drives you mad
bulletinTitle.bulletin35: Borgal, the strongest Krowser in the universe
bulletinTitle.bulletin40: Expedition, let's go to the original stellar system

bulletinSubtitle.bulletin8: A huge misunderstanding that leads to drama
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin11: A big strike from Senuth in a nearby colony
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin17: The Vusna Planet is already populated
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin26: The tower, too big fell under its own weight
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin30: The universal alliance balances the war
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin32: They do not learn from mistakes
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin33: The fire would be of criminal origin
bulletinSubtitle.bulletin34: Export of illegal products from the planet Zurgub

bulletinText.bulletin1: The queen of Krowsers has given birth to a thousand larvae. Some of the inhabitants Krowsers in the spacepole will soon be dislodged.
bulletinText.bulletin3: The colony "Ijhin Ksalfa" just elected its third president, Brust Bracoct. The Senuth community all over the empire is looking forward to see more of them in high positions.
bulletinText.bulletin4: Comet Teklo3 will cross the empire territory from the Versona system to Istafel. Traffic slowdown.
bulletinText.bulletin5: The colony of Isapoth filed for bankruptcy, so it is added to list to those which closed down. The inhabitants will be evacuated and sent to nearby colons.
bulletinText.bulletin6: A band of young Krowsers entered in the largest photonic power plant on the planet Sriplis, causing the explosion of the colony.
bulletinText.bulletin7: The spacepole celebrates its 3rd satellite, this new artificial star would be able to accommodate 5 billion inhabitants.
bulletinText.bulletin8: Last night, a Covridian presented a discovery in front of Kavgas, who misunderstood his words. Debriefing of Davis, the Covridian: "They thought that I was lowering their intellect.I still say that the Kavgas have less patience than all other people, science demonstrated it. "
bulletinText.bulletin9: The US (Union Stellar) has just installed a spaceport in a planet that they have just named Orro Rotrin, a new victory!
bulletinText.bulletin10: The famous T27 carrier, containing more than 1 billion settlers and more than 20 million buildings, was hit by space debris, the shock may hit the neighboring planets.
bulletinText.bulletin11: In the Enu'aj Teligg colony of the Ho'gonu star system, Senuths are on strike. No change in the colony.
bulletinText.bulletin12: The Stello project, which claimed to be revolutionary, was aborted.The decision comes from the top of the spacepole.The risks of failure were too big.
bulletinText.bulletin13: The ambassador and founder of the third Colony rests on the planet he served for a century. Here are the last words of the ambassador: "Stack blocks, manage stupid people, it's over for me, Goodbye!" A poignant testimony.
bulletinText.bulletin14: The Tchekek Empire claims a stellar system from the US territory. The authorities react by populating the system.
bulletinText.bulletin15: A collaborative project between Covridians and Kavgas gives rise to a revolutionary military technology. The Kavga Army is eager to try this new weapon. The population is more afraid of the consequences than anything else.
bulletinText.bulletin16: The death of a star has given rise to a black hole. More than 20 ships have been absorbed by this hole, and the traffic within the territory of the US reaches the red level.
bulletinText.bulletin17: The first observations on the planet Vusna revealed the existence of a non-listed living species. The specimen does not look like anything already known. He constantly repeats "call home", the research is ongoing.
bulletinText.bulletin18: On the occasion of this day of art, the Eari community initiates to redecorate the spacepole in the image of new trends. Testimony of a Kavga: "It's ugly." To pounder.
bulletinText.bulletin19: The orchestra "Earythm" will make a great tour throughout the Stellar Union across all settlements, before playing the grand finale in the high neighborhoods of the spacepole. A Senuth says about the Tour : <text:s xmlns:text="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:text:1.0" />"I can do better, and all by myself. Blowing in a pipe and waving his arms, it's within the reach of anyone."
bulletinText.bulletin20: Recent research about the extinction of the original system shows that the star did not go out naturally. An investigation launch to solve this mystery which concerns all the population of the US.
bulletinText.bulletin21: Public enemy number 2, Vortex has once again escaped from the Union's most secure prison, with its natural gift for creating portals to a safe place. This is the 87th time this month. A prison guard Kavga says: "At this level it's not an evasion, it's a national sport..."
bulletinText.bulletin22: Biilkal, a Senuth at the head of the most popular entertainment company in the SU opens its famous Coaster Union parks. This will delight the entire population.
bulletinText.bulletin23: After taming a native animal species of the Zurgub planet, a group of cheese makers Covridians sold more than one thousand cheeses. People from Colony 5 were hallucinating for several weeks.
bulletinText.bulletin24: A UFO approached the territory of the Union with a puppet and the inscription "DON'T PANIC" on it. The object seems to be a vehicle coming from an under-evolved planet named "Earth", very far from our systems.
bulletinText.bulletin25: A museum just opened in Sector 2 of the Spatiopole. We can see all preserved works of the original system. Just the thing to preserve the culture of our forgotten ancestors.
bulletinText.bulletin26: The old spaceport of one of the first settlement has collapsed under its own weight. The first guilty in this case is the ambassador of Colony 2, in charge of the urban placement. He apparently built a tower of 57 buildings. He said : <text:s xmlns:text="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:text:1.0" />"I wanted to see if there was a limit!" His limit is now the walls of prison.
bulletinText.bulletin27: The planet Dortus Laan is recently the source of a conflict between the Tchekek empire and SU. Su has put a spaceport there. The empire reacts by installing one of its bases on the other side of the planet, making of this crisis of territory a race towards the colonialization.
bulletinText.bulletin28: The high lady of the Tchekek empire died last night. This piece of news does not only sadden the empire, the entire population of the Union is touched. Indeed, the lady facilitated relations between the two camps. The peace of the universe is weakened by her death.
bulletinText.bulletin29: The Tchekek empire is organizing the 11th meeting of the great galactic games. For the first time, Avarez's system joins the competition, they added two sports from their cultures: Basketball in zero gravity and surfing on grass.
bulletinText.bulletin30: Several people of red galaxies are joining together and forming the Universal Alliance. A power that stabilizes tensions between the US and the Chekek empire.
bulletinText.bulletin31: Colony 118 struck again by placing their generators on top of each other. The overload resulted in a fire that the fire department could not handle in time.
bulletinText.bulletin32: Colony 118, still on the front page of the US newsletter. The ambassador has over-prioritized a particular race for housing. Riots broke out.
bulletinText.bulletin33: A fire spread in colony 3, destroying several buildings. A suspicious Kavga has been arrested. He says: "It's not me, I was killing a few things with a flamethrower when it happened!" Words that do not help.
bulletinText.bulletin34: A large network was dismantled by SU detectives. Indeed, a band of Eari reclaimed animals and illicit products to resell them to other colonies. The investigation is continuing.
bulletinText.bulletin35: Borgal, the famous Krowser bodybuilder, moves from colony to colony to help the inhabitants. He can lift buildings with one hand and can terraform a planet with his fists. Appreciable.
bulletinText.bulletin36: The colony of Trebeh discovered a spice, which in contact with electricity, becomes an eatable and delicious porridge. Experiments are on the way to solve the problem of food in the colonies.
bulletinText.bulletin37: Covridians have found the methods of growing plants, dating from their home planet "Zuvriia". Delicious vegetables soon in the colonies?
bulletinText.bulletin38: Senuthia, the home planet of the Senuths, contained incredible technology, allowing the Senuths to do nothing themselves. An expedition is preparing to go get this technology, in our native system now without star.
bulletinText.bulletin39: Evil creatures have just come out of the original star system. The ancient planet Kavga, ingeniously called "Planet-Kavga" by these inhabitants, seems to be the point of departure. <text:s xmlns:text="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:text:1.0" />a Kavga says: "Well what do you think? That we come from a cute and welcoming planet?"
bulletinText.bulletin40: Explorers want to come back to the original star system, where we all come from, to our respective planets to understand why our star suddenly went out. More than 350,000 batteries are planned to power the team's lamps.

moodAffect.moodEvolution: The mood is currently impacted by :

flagParameter.nuisancegenerator: Generate {0} nuisance at a range of {1}
flagParameter.firemanstation: Puts out fires at a range of {0}
flagParameter.workinghours: The building may not stay open at all times
flagParameter.policestation: Prevents riots at a range of {0}
flagParameter.flagneeder: Needs another kind of building to work
flagParameter.repairer: Repairs damaged bulidings in a range of {0}
flagParameter.extractor: Needs a mine nearby to function
flagParameter.barrack: Needs a nest nearby to function
flagParameter.foodprovider: Provides food to all buildings in a range of {0}
flagParameter.spatioport: All buildings must be linked to the spatioport

notification.selfBridging: You can't bridge a block to itself
notification.cannotUseTool: You cannot use this tool here
notification.cannotBuildOverBridge: You can't build over a bridge
notification.cannotBuildOutOfMap: You can't build out of the map
notification.cannotPlaceThisBlockHere: You can't place this block here
notification.cannotBuildAboveThis: You can't build above this building

conditionalUnlock.toUnlockThisBuildingYouMust: Locked until the following conditions are met:

eventTitle.event8: Family is a very sacred thing

eventDescription.event1: Can we have a cotton candy machine in the lounge or is it asking too much? It will obviously be specially made for us and not for other breeds because they don't need it. Our well-being must be your priority. A better lounge for Senuths.
eventDescription.event2: Well hello... I live in a very nice place, but the look of $CITY_NAME doesn't fit my personality at all.With your agreement, I would like to carve and paint all around my home to prove my artistic value to all! A Better house for an Eari.
eventDescription.event3: Greetings !My men and I need a lot of spinach to even get better! I noticed in some of my men a decline in health because of a poor diet, it isn't tolerable! I came to see you to have an extra supply of food for those men! Over and out! More food for Kavgas !
eventDescription.event4: I just had a brilliant, brilliant idea!! I can do a little something with a crystal that I ... borrowed from the mine I explored!Let me tinker with a Factory for some time, and after that, it will be even more powerful! A Covridian idea.
eventDescription.event5: Hel ... Hello, I come to see you because a factory is starting to get very dirty and I ... I would like to clean it. But there are always too many people inside!Can you please shut down a part of the factory so that I can clean it up ... almost everywhere? Many people are starting to cough because of the dust. Clean the factory ?
eventDescription.event6: Between naps, I had a wonderful idea, that my friends immediately applauded.I would like to organize a contest of "Trash throwing" on barracks. I find the concept very interesting and it will make an extra occupation to these Kavgas brutes. A new game for Senuths !
eventDescription.event7: A friend and me created an ingenious system of wired communication!We use two pots connected to one wire. But this communication system is a short-range one. We must scream in the handset ... Even if it may embarrass the other inhabitants of $CITY_NAME, science has no time to lose! Help the two Covridians finish their invention.
eventDescription.event8: I ... I've been separated from my family since my departure to join this colony and I have the opportunity to bring them here thanks to ... Thanks to an acquaintance. Can they come in the next batch of settlers? Welcome the family of the lonely inhabitant?
eventDescription.event9: The crystals found in a mine are astounding!I would like to study them, with a research method that uses sulfur, nitroglycerin, potassium nitrate and stones! Stones are harmless, do not worry! Can I ? Authorize the Covridian to study the stones?
eventDescription.event10: We find that this factory is not really pretty in this beautiful colony that you built ... With your consent, we can undertake a special renovation ... Of course, it won't be a real factory anymore, but the building will be more easy on the eye. Better buildings for Earis.
eventDescription.event11: Greetings !I discovered traces of small woodlice in one house ! Many people tell me that they are harmless but I don't believe it! I can go and pacify this area if you allow me to! Over and out. Authorize the Kavga to pacify the area ?
eventDescription.event12: The period of the art banquet has arrived!We celebrate nature, water and the natural energy that flows from it. We will need extra food because food represents life. In fact, fat is life. More food for Earis.
eventDescription.event13: Hello.In order to help those poor people who are working hard at the factory, I decided to make a move. So that they don't think they work for nothing, I can turn on all the lights in my house . Yes, I am a great person. They might feel more important.. Offer the light of hope.
eventDescription.event14: Labor Day has begun, a feast that dates back to our old planet! During this day, we work more and faster! The faster our tools overheat, the more we laugh ... May we ... Can we ... start this celebration now? Start this celebration ?
eventDescription.event15: On this clement day, my group and I composed a piece of very pure music, which advocates open-mindedness, good-heartedness and thoughtfulness. This song is to be played at 125 Db, so that our neighbors could hear this magnificent quartet. Can we start? Let's Sing !
eventDescription.event16: We've been investigating a hazardous issue on the power accumulators during the past week and we believe that we found the source of the problem. With your agreement, boss, we would like to proceed to replace the faulty piece. Replace the faulty piece ?
eventDescription.event17: We are a lot of Senuths to think that this colony is too simple, not easy enough on the eye, not to mention the smells ... But that's not the question! We would like to see in this colony a real, aesthetic, powerful and impacting tower! A real tower for the colony ?
eventDescription.event18: Three friends and I are creating one of the most beautiful sculptures that have ever been invented! We are almost there but we need peace and space ...Can you book the workshop so we can go down in history? Authorize the budding artists to book the workshop ?
eventDescription.event19: Greetings !A slightly insane scientist came to see us with a new type of "revolutionary" weapon, I think it uses crystals. If we manage to handle them, we will be able to atta... Defend the colony from those creatures even more effectively! But ... It will be necessary to manage to handle them ... Authorization granted? Authorize Kavga to use this weapon model?
eventDescription.event20: Please stop what you are doing and listen to us. Well.We contacted friends from another colony and discovered spices that turn into delicious food when put in contact with energy. We can ask our friends to send us large barrels of spices, to convert the electricity of the spaceport into food. We like good food. Authorize barrels of spices to create new food ?
eventDescription.event21: Sorry to disturb you, we are many to say that looking for new mines would be interesting for the colony, because our mines will not be eternal ... Can you handle it? Looking for new mines ?
eventDescription.event22: Well, we are just here to say that we want two new casinos.We need more, we love wealth. Apparently, you are a smart person ... Apparently ... We should not be the ones telling you this. And if that is not done... Build the two new Casinos for Senuths?
eventDescription.event23: We have heard that the colony 118 makes candies that make them more creative and that allow them to see different colors.The only drawback is that these sweets make you want to eat more of them ... Anyway, we are interested, can we have some? Authorize the import of candies?
eventDescription.event24: Greetings !We are going to start a period of weight loss, we are going to be on high alert, but we will not use them! The food is excluded! Do you agree ? Over and out! No food for Kavgas.
eventDescription.event25: We think that one television per room in all high houses would be the least one can do. We like programs in which 100 Kavgas have to fight until there is only one left. So please provide us these televisions. For each home. Give a TV to inhabitants ?
eventDescription.event26: Hello haha ââ!!We want to test a new mode of communication based on laser! So, it's a little dangerous, but hey! These are only small "Nucleoexplonapalmocute" type lasers! With your agreement, we can test this laser towards the sky, to communicate with the vessels that transports buildings ... Otherwise we will do it in the city! No worries, I tell you not to worry! Authorize the new communication system ?
eventDescription.event2000: Hello, spaceport here.You will receive your first settlers tomorrow. These are Covridians, a breed that particularly appreciates science. So they need a house and a laboratory to be able to work here. You will find these buildings at the bottom left of your management screen, you can place them by clicking or drag'n'drop them directly on the field. You can place a big house under the spaceport to connect it. As well place a laboratory underneath it. Drag & drop the big house from the "Houses" tab and a laboratory from the tab to the spaceport.
eventDescription.event2001: Hello, spaceport here.To connect the buildings amongst themselves, instead of piling them up, you can connect them with bridges. Hold the RIGHT- CLICK button and slide the mouse to create a bridge between two buildings at the same height. Buildings connected by bridges are considered as adjacent, regardless of the distance between them. Hold the RIGHT- CLICK button and slide the mouse to create a bridge between two buildings at the same height.
eventDescription.event2002: Hello, spaceport here.We will soon receive Krowsers. It is a race that loves to work in mines. They would need a factory to work in the mine. In addition, they do not necessarily appreciate luxury housing, an medium house will be perfect for them. Place the factory so that it is adjacent to the mine and the medium house not far from it. For these buildings to work, they need energy. They must be connected to your city. All buildings needs energy to work.
eventDescription.event2003: Hel ... Hello ... We apologize, but to be able to work, we would need access to the mine from the factory. The factory must be connected to the mine by a bridge. In addition ... Our buildings need a lot of electricity and the spaceport does not provide enough ... Can you put a power plant to generate more energy? Thank you ... And sorry for the inconvenience! Every building has a range that diffuse its effects by the height of towers and by the bridges.
eventDescription.event2004: Hello, spaceport here.Buildings need electricity to operate. As for the settlers, they need food. We can provide some electricity and some food from the spaceport, but not enough for the next comers. The Kavgas are a warrior race that will not like having not enough food. Please order a mess and a fire station so that they can exercise their ... Work. They will be able to live in average homes. Settlers need food, the food is available with a mess.
eventDescription.event2005: Good morning!We need access to the nests of creatures that populate this planet. This is probably a source of danger, we will take care of it! The nests of creatures regenerate little by little and the more we are on these nests, the more the nest will lose creatures! Yaah !! Hum ... Over and out. Nests are ocupations for Kavgas placed at fixed and random locations on the map such as mines.
eventDescription.event2006: Hello, spaceport here.Earis are on their way to our colony. It is a peaceful breed, for whom art takes precedence over everything. They appreciate the accommodations without any comfort. Order and place a small house and a workshop.
eventDescription.event2007: Hmm ... Hello ... The Earis have arrived and are very happy to be here ...They ... are having a party and I'm afraid it's going to get out of hand ... Can you ... Could you put a police and fire station? Just in case ... Thank you ... I do not want my family living in a dilapidated place ... And then you will not have to deal with them, these buildings handle the problems that are within their range. Th...Thank you. Safety buildings are essential to the proper functioning of the city.
eventDescription.event2008: Greetings!The Earis have put everything upside down! Fortunately you have placed buildings to block their enthusiasm. Otherwise, we would have solved that ourselves. We should now fix their nonsense with a repair craft in range. Over and out. Repair craft is essential to ensure the stability of buildings.
eventDescription.event2009: Hello, spaceport here.Senuths are almost there. Formerly, this race was very developed and very rich. You must order a big house and ... A lounge. These people do not really like work, being used to idleness. The buildings have a significant color according to the people they influence.
eventDescription.event2010: Try to build the most beautiful, largest and most impressive city possible!
eventDescription.event1000: $PLAYER_NAME, I'm afraid you may have upset the settlers. A lot that I fear you won't find anyone to follow your words anymore. The population is tired and angry. It's time for you to leave $CITY_NAME- we hope the Space Union will send another governor soon. I wish you the best of luck in your next firm - may it end up better for you! You lose !

scriptAction.INCREASE_ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_FOR_BUILDING: A building consumes {2} energy during {1} cycles!
scriptAction.INCREASE_HOUSE_NOTATION: Increase the notation of a house by {2} during {1} cycles!
scriptAction.ADD_SETTLERS_TO_NEXT_WAVE: {2} {0}s will arrive at the next cycle!
scriptAction.LAY_MULTIPLE_SCHEME_ON_POSITION: {2} buildings will fall on the city!
scriptAction.LAY_SCHEME_ON_POSITION: A building will fall on the city!
scriptAction.REMOVE_FLAG_FROM_BUILDING: A building will lose a function!
scriptAction.REMOVE_FLAG_FROM_BUILDING_FOR_DURATION: A building will lose a function during {1} cycles!

choice.event21_1: I'll see what I can do
